title: Illaoi is actually pretty flirtacious
body:
Everyone wants to type-cast her as the big, religious, strong woman with tentacles.

But if you pay attention to her lore and quotes, she's actually the big, religious, strong woman with tentacles, who can also be quite a flirt.

She also has motivation for it like how {{champion:21}}  does it for power plays or {{champion:103}}  does it for essence. 
{{champion:420}}'s religion is all about the will to act. ["If I hate something, I destroy it. If I want something, I take it."](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/47/Illaoi.move01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20151114232122)

replies.body:
I have a serious soft spot for ol' Aeoli The Sandwich Priestess. She and Leona are my two "don't mess with my ADC" thicc girl supports.

(Spoiler alert: Illaoi support is epic. Max E first, watch the sadness consume your enemies.)

(Also C3Sound's tentacle slap sound design is so darn satisfying)

(I'm done with parenthesis now)
Eh, Leona from what i understand was Based on Iron Stylus's wife form what I've hear. She does need muscle though, especially new Leona, Murdering heretics is great exercise, or so I've been told.

{{champion:254}} I must be blind because I consider Vi thicc in at least a small amount

{{champion:429}} Be careful what you wish for
Vi is tough, but isn't like, Syndra levels of thicc. I would enjoy Syndra levels of thicc on Vi.
...Syndra is thicc?
She is ingame, not really in her splash. Its weird. But trust, just look up BrickOrchid's opinion on Syndra thighs.
These people don’t know what thicc means
{{champion:113}} is pretty thicc imo, look at her Classic Sej splash.

{{champion:114}} 
A fencer is better off being slim and fit than thicc.

> [{quoted}](name=YouCanMilkThose,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=00010003000000000004,timestamp=2017-12-14T12:21:23.239+0000)
>
> {{champion:114}} 
> A fencer is better off being slim and fit than thicc.

Dem legs and ass tho, Still thicc for someone that is slim and lite.
Hard pass on Kalista, bitch is a wraith, she's supposed to be emaciated.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=00010003000000000002,timestamp=2017-12-14T03:04:41.433+0000)
>
> Hard pass on Kalista, bitch is a wraith, she's supposed to be emaciated.

Randomly calling women bitches.

No, just Kalista.

I will never not hate that champion with a burning passion.
Ah, now that explains it, you've got a grudge against her. Ok then. :P
From what I've seen of Women's Fencing, Fiora is about as thicc as she should be.

> [{quoted}](name=JacctheInsomniac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=0001000300000000,timestamp=2017-12-13T23:19:57.066+0000)

> 
> My personal list of League grills who aren't very thicc but should be

{{champion:114}} probably has a body like a dancer.
Riven's arm legitimately upset me. They're so skinny it's gross.
Sometimes thiccness is a state of mind...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=000100030001,timestamp=2017-12-14T07:13:13.206+0000)
>
> Sometimes thiccness is a state of mind...

HERESY!!!!!

Not really, no. Thiccness is pretty clearly a physical state, although it may be enhanced by having an appropriate state of mind.

It doesn't matter what Leona's state of mind is, she skinny.
Get League Girls Swol 2018

> [{quoted}](name=JacctheInsomniac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-12-13T21:51:55.862+0000)
>
> But Leona isn't Thicc...
> 
> I mean, I'd love it if she was. Girl can crush rocks underfoot, she deserves some thigh muscle (same with Sejuani and all that Boar riding)

Sej is slender but ripped. That is on the lower end of T H I C C N E S S

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-13T18:33:13.463+0000)

> (Spoiler alert: Illaoi support is epic. Max E first, watch the sadness consume your enemies.)
> 
> (Also C3Sound's tentacle slap sound design is so darn satisfying)
> 
> (I'm done with parenthesis now)

Aeoli Sandwich Illaoi confirmed new skin.

Skins Team: "Oh no, here he comes again..."
TreblMuffin: "You guys-"
Skins Team: "No."
TreblMuffin: "But the name-"
Skins Team: "Please leave us alone."
TreblMuffin: "Just try drawing it."
Skins Team: "Fine."
Everyone: "My. God..."

*Releases skin

*Riot wins grammys

*Everyone claps vigorously
You sir.......need to come here more often. M&G will *gladly* accept you with open arms.
Well..yeah the "My. God..." part fit well as Illaoi believes she represents a literal god. lol

"Audio Mixer"
That sounds that a fun job (not being sarcastic (just in case you took it that way (I am also done with parentheses)))!

I have never worked with such a merry band of weirdos. Solid to the core. The audio team knows how to party. Just ask Riot KarateMonkey. That dude destroys our foley room on the regular. After Urgot was released we were finding ground meat all over the room for weeks. That's what happens when you shove a drill into a few pounds of hamburger.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-12-14T07:18:12.767+0000)
>
> That's what happens when you shove a drill into a few pounds of hamburger.

I'm afraid to ask.......but...........

why?

Like all great sound design it was about 30% "You only live once." and 60% "Let's see what happens."

The remaining 10% is just childish giggling.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=g0Ua6NZ0,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-14T07:37:04.575+0000)
>
> Like all great sound design it was about 30% "You only live once." and 60% "Let's see what happens."
> 
> The remaining 10% is just childish giggling.

What are the qualifications to join the sound team? cause like

that sounds fucking awesome
(you have the paranthe-keys to my heart)

I'VE BEEN DOING ILLAOI SUPPORT SINCE SHE CAME OUT, THANKS.

START Q, GET E SECOND LEVEL, COMMUNICATE THAT YOUR ADC SHOULD ATTACK IT WHENEVER YOU PULL A SOUL, MAX ORDER IS R > Q > E > W

Illaoi's Tentacles don't do shit-all for damage if you don't max Q first, and since you're focusing on being a Poke-lane, and destroying the souls as quickly as possible, the E-Transfer damage isn't AS important as the E-Passive Tentacle damage that comes after.

Start Relic, work towards an Early IBG, my final build normally looks like this:

{{item:3401}}/{{item:2303}} [More Vision? More Protection for your Carry. Your choice], {{item:3025}}, {{item:3068}}, {{item:3071}}/{{item:3022}}  (Armor Shred's good for your Carry, and CDR for you, but Slows on your W make your Tentacle smashes do more work later, and the Extra health makes you harder to Crush come lategame), {{item:3065}}/{{item:3109}}  (You need heals? Your team needs damage sponge? Again, decisions) and {{item:3047}}/{{item:3111}}
I don't play her much, but every now and then and holy FUCK the tentacle noises are amazing. The sounds make me feel like I'm under water, and with headphones on it's even better.
Oh so im not the only one.... I share your sentiment TreblMuffin i truely understand you!

{{champion:420}}  to {{champion:201}}  quotes are some of the best in the game.

"Northman. There are motions I would like to show you."

 "I know you are strong. I wonder if you have stamina."

"Finally, a man who won't break."
But her old boyfriend GP has all those things and if he runs out of stamina he just eats some blood oranges and he's right back in fighting form
yeah these are really good ones. (and everyone thought eve was the first with "dirty" quotes hehe)
Yes she is. It falls in line with her religion of how to live.
She has a few flirts with Braum, and dated Gangplank. Didn’t think it was news to people.
{{champion:223}} My favorite thicc girl

I'm the only one that asks himself if flirtacious champions like these three, just flirt, or go until the end with the consequences?

To explain myseld better with an example: there is the kind of seductress/seductor that flirts only to get something, and before the night ends, she/he has disappereaded with what they wanted, because they separate work from pleasure. And there is the kind that only does that the next morning, because they found their objective hot, and wanted to have a night of fun with him/her.

With {{champion:420}}  seems to be more like the second kind. With {{champion:103}} , probably the first.
With {{champion:21}} ? I don't see the answer so clear.

This thread, GG
Im already under fire for playing OriSupp and now I may aswell try IllaoiSupp when I get enough BE.

~~Im coming back here and blaming all of you when I lose my acc for trollpicking ~~

PS: pray for my adcs

However, my goal cannot merely be to exceed any other person. My goal… for all eternity… will be to exceed myself! To constantly exceed myself, to continually break through my own barriers! I will always walk my own path, all the way to the end! Thus, the Dao of Meng Hao is a direction. Freedom! Independence! No cares or worries! What I want, the Heavens shall NOT lack! What I don’t want, had BETTER not exist in the Heavens! Being domineering. Having freedom. This… is the Dao of Meng Hao!
